channel.title: Explore Mobile App on Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Explore Mobile App on Wiki

item.title: Download and Installation
item.description: For Android, you can download the .apk file from here: Android For iOS, we provide an app file on request. For any information or assistance, please contact support@mentalab.com and we will assist you further.

item.title: Usage
item.description: Please note that currently the app only supports Mentalab Explore Pro 8-channel devices at 250Hz. Homepage: Scan and connect to nearby Explore Devices. Cog menu: Change visulization Filter settings Disconnect Check app version Impedance tab: Inspect impedance values. Assign channel positions. EXG tab: Visualize ExG data. Dot menu: Adapt visulization settings (y-axis scaling). Record raw ExG data in CSV format. Bottom bar: Inspect device name, temperature, battery charge

item.title: Tests
item.description: Following are the devices we used to testing: Device OS version Lenovo Tab M9 Android 13 Samsung S23 Ultra Android 14 Zenfone 10 Android 14 iPhone 15 iOS 18 iPhone 13 iOS 17 iPhone SE (gen 3) iOS 17 Known bugs: Denying bluetooth and nearby devices permissions can result on connection failure.
